Regular Price: No way! It's also free?!

Description

Are you the hunter or the hunted? Explore a nightmarish house that holds dark, terrible secrets in every room. Can you come to terms with what you've done? Or is it all in your head?

Features

  • Old-school text adventure in the style of classics like Zork and Zork II.
  • Explore the macabre as blood-filled tubs and lifelike mannequins beckon.
  • Silence the cruel voices that threaten you or give in to the bloodlust.
  • Uncover a horrific truth hidden behind layers of misery and mystery.
